quest.name: Mother's Recipe
journal:
One cannot excavate on an empty stomach, as Qhoterl Pasol well knows.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid ant eggs at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid ant eggs to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid silkworms at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid silkworms to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid robber crab at the LozatlDeliver the splendid robber crab to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Digging is whisker-warping work, as I'm sure you will agree. If one is to keep at it day in and day out, one must have good, nourishing meals.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If you're willing, MistressMaster Forename, might I trouble you to bring some ingredients so that I can prepare a hearty meal for everyone? My Chaqurl, in particular, is still a growing boy, and few things please me more than to see his belly full and round.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: For the dish I plan to make, I still require three ant eggs. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to dig them up readily enough.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: For the dish I plan to make, I still require three silkworms. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to gather them readily enough.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: For the dish I plan to make, I still require a robber crab. If you fish at the Lozatl using fruit worms, I daresay they'll bite readily enough.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Three ant eggs ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to dig them up readily enough.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Three silkworms ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you search in the vicinity of Mjrl's Regret, you should be able to gather them readily enough.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: One robber crab ought to suffice for the dish I plan to make. If you fish at the Lozatl using fruit worms as bait, I daresay they'll bite readily enough.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: How fares the procuring effort, good madamsir?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ah, splendid! I shall stew these eggs with spices and serve them with cornbread.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: A delectable combination, as my Chaqurl will attest. He doesn't leave so much as a single crumb behind!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ah, splendid! Plump and fresh as they are, these silkworms are best prepared simply─fried and salted.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If there's a way to my husband's stomach, I can say with confidence that this dish is it. The shine in his eyes doesn't lie!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ah, splendid! I shall boil this crab whole with vegetables and serve it with steamed grains!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'm not too proud to admit that this is my personal favorite. Ah, the mere thought of it makes my mouth water... <slurp>

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Without further ado, I shall set about preparing the meal. We are all in for a treat, and it is thanks to you, good madamsir!
